00031 /* initialize all values in pMom to 0 */
00032 void k_InitMoment(TMoment* pMom)
00033 {
00034         pMom->m00=0;
00035         pMom->m10=0;
00036         pMom->m01=0;
00037         pMom->m20=0;
00038         pMom->m11=0;
00039         pMom->m02=0;
00040         pMom->m30=0;
00041         pMom->m21=0;
00042         pMom->m12=0;
00043         pMom->m03=0;
00044         pMom->m40=0;
00045         pMom->m31=0;
00046         pMom->m22=0;
00047         pMom->m13=0;
00048         pMom->m04=0;
00049 }

00054 
00055 T2DFloat k_DeriveCenterOfMassBinary(const TPixelGroup* pPixelGroup)
00056 {
00057         T2DFloat P2D;
00058         /* Test for illegal NULL parameters */
00059         if ((pPixelGroup==NULL) || (pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels==0))
00060         {
00061                 TString str;
00062                 k_InitString(&str);
00063                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00064                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DeriveCenterOfMassBinary() Given pixelgroup is either a NULL-"
00065                         "pointer or it contains no positions");
00066                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00067                 P2D.x=0;
00068                 P2D.y=0;
00069                 return P2D;
00070         }
00071         else
00072         {
00073                 long m10=0, m01=0;
00074                 T2DInt* p=pPixelGroup->pPos;
00075                 T2DInt* end=&(pPixelGroup->pPos[pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels]);
00076                 T2DFloat CM;
00077                 while(p!=end)
00078                 {
00079                         m10 += p->x;
00080                         m01 += p->y;
00081                         p++;
00082                 }
00083                 CM.x=(FLOAT32)m10/pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels;
00084                 CM.y=(FLOAT32)m01/pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels;
00085                 return CM;
00086         }
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool k_DeriveMomentsGrayTone(const TPixelGroup* pPixelGroup,double Background,
00090                                                          unsigned int MaxOrder,TMoment* pMom)
00091 /* If MaxOrder>2 up to fourth order moments are derived. Otherwise up to second order. */
00092 {
00093         unsigned int j;
00094         T2DInt p;
00095         double Gray;
00096         double x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4;
00097         
00098         /* Test for illegal NULL parameters */
00099         if ((pPixelGroup==NULL) || (pMom==NULL))
00100         {
00101                 TString str;
00102                 k_InitString(&str);
00103                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00104                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DeriveMomentsGrayTone() One of the parameters "
00105                         "pPixelGroup or pSource are NULL");
00106                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00107                 return false;
00108         }
00109         if (pPixelGroup->pColor==NULL)
00110         {
00111                 TString str;
00112                 k_InitString(&str);
00113                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00114                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DeriveMomentsGrayTone() The group contains no color info");
00115                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00116                 return false;
00117         }
00118         k_InitMoment(pMom); /* initialize all values in pMom to 0 */
00119         /* Calculate moments */
00120         if (MaxOrder<=2)
00121         {
00122                 for (j=0;j<pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels;j++)
00123                 {
00124                         p=pPixelGroup->pPos[j];
00125                         Gray=pPixelGroup->pColor[j]-Background;
00126                         y1=p.y;
00127                         y2=y1*y1;
00128                         y3=y1*y2;
00129                         y4=y2*y2;
00130                         x1=Gray*p.x;
00131                         x2=x1*p.x;
00132                         x3=p.x*x2;
00133                         x4=p.x*x3;
00134                         pMom->m00+=Gray;
00135                         pMom->m10+=x1;
00136                         pMom->m01+=y1*Gray;
00137                         pMom->m20+=x2;
00138                         pMom->m11+=x1*y1;
00139                         pMom->m02+=y2*Gray;
00140                 }
00141         }
00142         else /* MaxOrder>=3 */
00143         {
00144                 for (j=0;j<pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels;j++)
00145                 {
00146                         p=pPixelGroup->pPos[j]; /* inserted by edr after warning by VC++ 6.0, not tested */
00147                         Gray=pPixelGroup->pColor[j]-Background;
00148                         y1=p.y;
00149                         y2=y1*y1;
00150                         y3=y1*y2;
00151                         y4=y2*y2;
00152                         x1=Gray*p.x;
00153                         x2=x1*p.x;
00154                         x3=p.x*x2;
00155                         x4=p.x*x3;
00156                         pMom->m00+=Gray;
00157                         pMom->m10+=x1;
00158                         pMom->m01+=y1*Gray;
00159                         pMom->m20+=x2;
00160                         pMom->m11+=x1*y1;
00161                         pMom->m02+=y2*Gray;
00162                         pMom->m30+=x3;
00163                         pMom->m21+=x2*y1;
00164                         pMom->m12+=x1*y2;
00165                         pMom->m03+=y3*Gray;
00166                         pMom->m40+=x4;
00167                         pMom->m31+=x3*y1;
00168                         pMom->m22+=y2*x2;
00169                         pMom->m13+=x1*y3;
00170                         pMom->m04+=y4*Gray;
00171                 }
00172         }
00173         return true;
00174 }
00175 
00176 bool k_DeriveMomentsBinary(const TPixelGroup* pPixelGroup,unsigned int MaxOrder,TMoment* pMom)
00177 /* Same as k_DeriveMomentsGraytone, except that eh weight of each set pixel is one. */
00178 {
00179         unsigned int j;
00180         T2DInt p;
00181         double x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4;
00182         /* Test for illegal NULL parameters */
00183         if ((pPixelGroup==NULL) || (pMom==NULL))
00184         {
00185                 TString str;
00186                 k_InitString(&str);
00187                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00188                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DeriveMomentsBinary() One of the parameters "
00189                         "pPixelGroup or pMom are NULL");
00190                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00191                 return false;
00192         }
00193 
00194         k_InitMoment(pMom); /* initialize all values in pMom to 0 */
00195         /* Calculate moments */
00196         if (MaxOrder<=2)
00197         {
00198                 for (j=0;j<pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels;j++)
00199                 {
00200                         p=pPixelGroup->pPos[j];
00201                         y1=p.y;
00202                         y2=y1*y1;
00203                         y3=y1*y2;
00204                         y4=y2*y2;
00205                         x1=p.x;
00206                         x2=x1*p.x;
00207                         x3=p.x*x2;
00208                         x4=p.x*x3;
00209                         pMom->m00+=1;
00210                         pMom->m10+=x1;
00211                         pMom->m01+=y1;
00212                         pMom->m20+=x2;
00213                         pMom->m11+=x1*y1;
00214                         pMom->m02+=y2;
00215                 }
00216         }
00217         else /* MaxOrder>=3 */
00218         {
00219                 for (j=0;j<pPixelGroup->NumberOfPixels;j++)
00220                 {
00221                         p=pPixelGroup->pPos[j];
00222                         y1=p.y;
00223                         y2=y1*y1;
00224                         y3=y1*y2;
00225                         y4=y2*y2;
00226                         x1=p.x;
00227                         x2=x1*p.x;
00228                         x3=p.x*x2;
00229                         x4=p.x*x3;
00230                         pMom->m00+=1;
00231                         pMom->m10+=x1;
00232                         pMom->m01+=y1;
00233                         pMom->m20+=x2;
00234                         pMom->m11+=x1*y1;
00235                         pMom->m02+=y2;
00236                         pMom->m30+=x3;
00237                         pMom->m21+=x2*y1;
00238                         pMom->m12+=x1*y2;
00239                         pMom->m03+=y3;
00240                         pMom->m40+=x4;
00241                         pMom->m31+=x3*y1;
00242                         pMom->m22+=y2*x2;
00243                         pMom->m13+=x1*y3;
00244                         pMom->m04+=y4;
00245                 }
00246         }
00247         return true;
00248 }
00249 
00250 bool k_DeriveCentralMoments(const TMoment* pMom, TMoment* pCentrMom)
00251 /* Calculates central moments from simple moments */
00252 {
00253         double r10,r01;
00254         if ((pMom==NULL) || (pCentrMom==NULL))
00255         {
00256                 TString str;
00257                 k_InitString(&str);
00258                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00259                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DeriveCentralMoments() One of the "
00260                         "parameters are a NULL pointer");
00261                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00262                 return false;
00263         }
00264     r10=pMom->m10/pMom->m00;
00265         r01=pMom->m01/pMom->m00;
00266         pCentrMom->m00=pMom->m00;
00267         pCentrMom->m10=0;
00268         pCentrMom->m01=0;
00269         pCentrMom->m02=(pMom->m02-pMom->m01*pMom->m01/pMom->m00);
00270         pCentrMom->m11=(pMom->m11-pMom->m10*r01);
00271         pCentrMom->m20=(pMom->m20-pMom->m10*pMom->m10/pMom->m00);
00272         pCentrMom->m30=(pMom->m30-3*pMom->m20*r10+2*pMom->m10*r10*r10);
00273         pCentrMom->m12=(pMom->m12-pMom->m02*r10-2*pMom->m11*r01+2*r01*r01*pMom->m10);
00274         pCentrMom->m21=(pMom->m21-pMom->m20*r01-2*pMom->m11*r10+2*r10*r10*pMom->m01);
00275         pCentrMom->m03=(pMom->m03-3*pMom->m02*r01+2*pMom->m01*r01*r01);
00276         pCentrMom->m40=(pMom->m40-4*pMom->m30*r10+6*pMom->m20*r10*r10-
00277                 3*r10*r10*r10*r10*pMom->m00);
00278         pCentrMom->m31=(pMom->m31-3*r10*pMom->m21+3*r10*r10*pMom->m11-
00279                 r01*pMom->m30+3*r01*r10*pMom->m20-3*r01*r10*r10*pMom->m10);
00280         pCentrMom->m22=(pMom->m22-2*pMom->m21*r01+pMom->m20*r01*r01-
00281                 2*r10*pMom->m12+4*pMom->m10*pMom->m11*r01/pMom->m00+
00282                 r10*r10*pMom->m02-3*r10*r10*pMom->m01*pMom->m01/pMom->m00);
00283         pCentrMom->m13=(pMom->m13-3*pMom->m12*r01+3*pMom->m11*r01*r01-
00284                 pMom->m03*r10+3*pMom->m02*r10*r01-3*pMom->m01*r10*r01*r01);
00285         pCentrMom->m04=(pMom->m04-4*pMom->m03*r01+6*pMom->m02*r01*r01-
00286                 3*r01*r01*r01*r01*pMom->m00);
00287         return true;
00288 }
00289 
00290 bool k_DeriveCentralNormMoments(const TMoment* pMom, TMoment* pCentrNormMom)
00291 /* Calculates central normalised moments from simple moments */
00292 {
00293         double r10,r01,f1,f2,f3,f4;
00294         if ((pMom==NULL) || (pCentrNormMom==NULL))
00295         {
00296                 TString str;
00297                 k_InitString(&str);
00298                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00299                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DeriveCentralNormMoments() One of the "
00300                         "parameters are a NULL pointer");
00301                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00302                 return false;
00303         }
00304         f1=sqrt(pMom->m00);
00305         f2=pMom->m00;
00306         f3=f1*f2;
00307         f4=f2*f2;
00308         r10=pMom->m10/pMom->m00;
00309         r01=pMom->m01/pMom->m00;
00310         f1=sqrt(pMom->m00);
00311         f2=pMom->m00;
00312         f3=f1*f2;
00313         f4=f2*f2;
00314         pCentrNormMom->m00=pMom->m00;
00315         pCentrNormMom->m10=0;
00316         pCentrNormMom->m01=0;
00317         pCentrNormMom->m02=(pMom->m02-pMom->m01*pMom->m01/pMom->m00)/pMom->m00/f2;
00318         pCentrNormMom->m11=(pMom->m11-pMom->m10*r01)/pMom->m00/f2;
00319         pCentrNormMom->m20=(pMom->m20-pMom->m10*pMom->m10/pMom->m00)/pMom->m00/f2;
00320         pCentrNormMom->m30=(pMom->m30-3*pMom->m20*r10+2*pMom->m10*r10*r10)/pMom->m00/f3;
00321         pCentrNormMom->m12=(pMom->m12-pMom->m02*r10-2*pMom->m11*r01+2*r01*r01*pMom->m10)/pMom->m00/f3;
00322         pCentrNormMom->m21=(pMom->m21-pMom->m20*r01-2*pMom->m11*r10+2*r10*r10*pMom->m01)/pMom->m00/f3;
00323         pCentrNormMom->m03=(pMom->m03-3*pMom->m02*r01+2*pMom->m01*r01*r01)/pMom->m00/f3;
00324         pCentrNormMom->m40=(pMom->m40-4*pMom->m30*r10+6*pMom->m20*r10*r10-
00325                 3*r10*r10*r10*r10*pMom->m00)/pMom->m00/f4;
00326         pCentrNormMom->m31=(pMom->m31-3*r10*pMom->m21+3*r10*r10*pMom->m11-
00327                 r01*pMom->m30+3*r01*r10*pMom->m20-3*r01*r10*r10*pMom->m10)/pMom->m00/f4;
00328         pCentrNormMom->m22=(pMom->m22-2*pMom->m21*r01+pMom->m20*r01*r01-
00329                 2*r10*pMom->m12+4*pMom->m10*pMom->m11*r01/pMom->m00+
00330                 r10*r10*pMom->m02-3*r10*r10*pMom->m01*pMom->m01/pMom->m00)/pMom->m00/f4;
00331         pCentrNormMom->m13=(pMom->m13-3*pMom->m12*r01+3*pMom->m11*r01*r01-
00332                 pMom->m03*r10+3*pMom->m02*r10*r01-3*pMom->m01*r10*r01*r01)/pMom->m00/f4;
00333         pCentrNormMom->m04=(pMom->m04-4*pMom->m03*r01+6*pMom->m02*r01*r01-
00334                 3*r01*r01*r01*r01*pMom->m00)/pMom->m00/f4;
00335         return true;
00336 }
00337 
00338 bool k_DeriveHuInvariants(const TMoment* pCentrMom,double *pHu)
00339 /* Calculates Hu type moment invarians from central moments
00340         or central normalized moments. */
00341 {
00342         double a62,a64,b62,b64;
00343         pHu[0]=pCentrMom->m00;
00344         pHu[1]=pCentrMom->m20+pCentrMom->m02;
00345         pHu[2]=k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m20-pCentrMom->m02)+4*k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m11);
00346         pHu[3]=(pCentrMom->m20-pCentrMom->m02)*(k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m30+pCentrMom->m12)-k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m21+pCentrMom->m03))
00347                 +4*pCentrMom->m11*(pCentrMom->m30+pCentrMom->m12)*(pCentrMom->m03+pCentrMom->m21);
00348         pHu[4]=k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m30-3*pCentrMom->m12)+k_Sqr(3*pCentrMom->m21-pCentrMom->m03);
00349         pHu[5]=k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m30+pCentrMom->m12)+k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m21+pCentrMom->m03);
00350         pHu[6]=(pCentrMom->m30-3*pCentrMom->m12)*(pCentrMom->m30+pCentrMom->m12)*(k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m30+pCentrMom->m12)-
00351                 3*k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m21+pCentrMom->m03))+
00352                 (pCentrMom->m03-3*pCentrMom->m21)*(pCentrMom->m03+pCentrMom->m21)*(k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m03+pCentrMom->m21)-
00353                 3*k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m12+pCentrMom->m30));
00354         pHu[7]=(3*pCentrMom->m21-pCentrMom->m03)*(pCentrMom->m30+pCentrMom->m12)*(k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m30+pCentrMom->m12)-
00355                 3*k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m21+pCentrMom->m03))-
00356                 (3*pCentrMom->m12-pCentrMom->m30)*(pCentrMom->m03+pCentrMom->m21)*(k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m03+pCentrMom->m21)-
00357                 3*k_Sqr(pCentrMom->m12+pCentrMom->m30));
00358         pHu[8]=pCentrMom->m40+2*pCentrMom->m22+pCentrMom->m04;
00359         a62=pCentrMom->m40-pCentrMom->m04; a64=pCentrMom->m40-6*pCentrMom->m22+pCentrMom->m04;
00360         b62=2*(pCentrMom->m31+pCentrMom->m13); b64=4*(pCentrMom->m31-pCentrMom->m13);
00361         pHu[9]= k_Sqr(a62)+k_Sqr(b62);
00362         pHu[10]=k_Sqr(a64)+k_Sqr(b64);
00363         pHu[11]=a64*(k_Sqr(a62)-k_Sqr(b62))+2*a62*b62*b64;
00364         pHu[12]=b64*(k_Sqr(a62)-k_Sqr(b62))-2*a62*b62*a64;
00365         return true;
00366 }

00368 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00369 } /* end of extern "C" */
00370 } /* end namespace ipl */
00371 #endif
